pages.title: Citrine Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Citrine Armour you will need one Infused Citrine per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Citrine goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Citrine Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Citrine Armour to Gain a Permenant Fire Resistance Boost
